page.title: 19ADULT LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: We interviewed 218 people over the age of 11 years to find what they did in their spare time. The results are as follows: {Gardening 51% Watching Television 52% {D I Y 27% Decorating 32% {Reading 35% Walking 22% {Swimming 17% Belong to a club 4% {Knitting 15% Bird Watching 2% {Cooking 24% Going to Pub/Club 22% {Sewing 17% Go to Theatre 2% {Sport 20% Go to Cinema 1% {Fishing 6% Taking part in Sport 3% {Dancing 19% Car Mechanics 10% {Bingo 10% Visiting Friends 36% {Playing a musical instrument 3% The Survey showed that over half of the people interviewed watch television regularly and worked in their gardens. Because there is no Cinema or Theatre in Spalding may account the low numbers going to them.
